Intersection | NYC | Full-time | Onsite | http://www.intersection.com

Senior Software Engineer, Senior DevOps Engineer, Android Platform Software Engineer, and more

We're the people behind LinkNYC (https://www.link.nyc/). You may have heard about the "obscenely fast" free public wifi we're installing all over New York City (http://gizmodo.com/nycs-new-public-wifi-is-obscenely-fast-17...). Come help us make it even better.

But that's not all we do. We create products and experiences that use technology to make shared spaces amazing.

Full set of job postings here: http://www.intersection.com/careers.html
